pull.title: Remove unused fTry from push_lock
pull.body: After #9674 (618ee92) the `fTry` argument in `push_lock` is no longer needed.

events.body:
post-merge ACK 92848e5058c7667c61c358ea2c46f07a6edc468b

follow-up question: Is there any need for the member variable `fTry` in `CLockLocation`? If not, can we remove that and also the `fTry` argument in `EnterCritical()`?
